entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student at Hogwarts and is interacting with Harry Potter.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character in the story and is being advised by Wood to capture the Snitch quickly.

entities.name: wood
entities.description: Wood is a teacher at Hogwarts who advises Harry to capture the Snitch quickly.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher at Hogwarts and is mentioned as being angry and looking mean.

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Fred Weasley is Ron's brother and is observing the scene outside the changing room.

entities.name: hufflepuff
entities.description: Hufflepuff is a house at Hogwarts that Snape is favoring too much according to Wood.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts and has come to watch the game.

relationships.description: Snape is favoring Hufflepuff too much according to Wood.
Dumbledore's presence makes it safe for Harry Potter.
